attributes.action: Also Enforce The Unfair Smoking Ban In The House Of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that, as per usual, the people and politicians of this NANNY STATE don't fall under the same laws & smoking will still be allowed in certain places in the house of lords. What on this earth makes them any different from the rest of us apart from a badge.
